main event: A light, similar to a spotlight, was observed rising rapidly from behind buildings in Chicago.
interesting points: The light rose at a fast rate of speed,The light faded from sight after half a minute,The observation lasted for thirty minutes,Possible explanations include aircraft, satellite, or astronomical phenomena,The report was made by Capt. J. A. Brown from Williams AFB.
witness description: Capt. J. A. Brown from the 737th ACORN, Williams AFB.
